children.name: User can cancel a draft policy creation {"FileType":"powerpoint","ContentFlag":"Metadata","DraftFlagType":"disallow","CurrentFlagType":"sanitise"} @portal @functional @TEST-213
User can update the current Adaptation policy settings {"FileType":"excel","ContentFlag":"InternalHyperlinks","DraftFlagType":"sanitise","CurrentFlagType":"disallow"} @portal @functional @TEST-214
User can delete a draft policy {"FileType":"excel","ContentFlag":"ExternalHyperlinks","DraftFlagType":"sanitise","CurrentFlagType":"disallow"} @portal @functional @TEST-239
User can publish a draft Adaptation Policy {"FileType":"pdf","ContentFlag":"Acroform","DraftFlagType":"disallow","CurrentFlagType":"sanitise"} @portal @functional @TEST-240

User can update and publish both Adaptation and NCFS policies at the same time {"FileType":"word","ContentFlag":"EmbeddedImages","FlagType":"sanitise","url":"icap-client-qa.uksouth.cloudapp.azure.com","CurrentFlagType":"disallow"} @portal @functional @TEST-241
User can change the number of previous polcy records displayed on a page {"itemCount":"25","rowCount":"25"} @functional @portal @TEST-217
User can change the number of previous polcy records displayed on a page {"itemCount":"50","rowCount":"50"} @functional @portal @TEST-217
User can change the number of previous polcy records displayed on a page {"itemCount":"100","rowCount":"100"} @functional @portal @TEST-217
User can view previous Policy details @portal @functional @TEST-218
User can activate a previous policy @portal @functional @TEST-219
User can download the full XML analysis report for a file {"supportedFile":"src/data/multiset/file1.docx","xmlFile":"file1.xml"} @portal @filedrop @TEST-225
User can download the full PDF analysis report for a file {"supportedFile":"src/data/multiset/file1.docx","pdfFile":"file1.xml"} @portal @TEST-226 @filedrop

User can see the result of a repaired file with the issues removed {"activeContentFile":"src/data/multiset/file1.docx","activeContent":"Internal Hyperlinks present in CT_Bookmark","repairedObject":"APP segment removed"} @functional @portal @filedrop @TEST-228

User can see the result of a unrepaired file with the list of structural issues not removed {"fileWithIssues":"src/data/multiset/file2.pdf","nonrepairedObject":"Non-conforming image"} @functional @portal @filedrop @TEST-229

User can process a supported file through the file drop service {"supportedFile":"src/data/multiset/issues.docx","fileName":"issues.docx","fileType":"docx","fileSize":"11603","processStatus":"Your file has been processed"} @functional @portal @TEST-230

User can process a supported file through the file drop service {"supportedFile":"src/data/multiset/structuralIssues.xlsx","fileName":"structuralIssues.xlsx","fileType":"xlsx","fileSize":"187294","processStatus":"Your file has been processed"} @functional @portal @TEST-230

User cannot process a non-supported file or unprocessable file size through the file drop service {"file":"src/data/multiset/icaptest.ps1","error":"Please use a supported file type"} @functional @TEST-231 @filedrop @portal
User can update the non-compliant routes API URL {"url":"icap-client-qa.uksouth.cloudapp.azure.com"} @portal @functional @TEST-158
User can change the outcome of unprocessable files {"routeOption":"relay-unprocessableFileTypes","updatedRouteOption":"Relay"} @portal @functional @TEST-183
User can change the outcome of Glasswall Blocked files {"routeOption":"block-glasswallBlockedFiles","updatedRouteOption":"Block"} @portal @functional @TEST-187
User can filter the request log using a default time interval(1, 12 or 24 hrs) {"timeInterval":"1 Hour","datetimeFrom":"1","datetimeTo":"current time"} @portal @functional @TEST-167
User can filter the request log using a default time interval(1, 12 or 24 hrs) {"timeInterval":"12 Hours","datetimeFrom":"12","datetimeTo":"current time"} @portal @functional @TEST-167
User can filter the request log using a default time interval(1, 12 or 24 hrs) {"timeInterval":"24 Hours","datetimeFrom":"24","datetimeTo":"current time"} @portal @functional @TEST-167
User can filter the request log using a custom range and see all transactions within that range {"datetimeFrom":"11/02/2021 10:00 AM","datetimeTo":"12/02/2021 10:00 AM"} @portal @functional @TEST-235
User cannot filter the date range to a time greater than 24 hours {"datetimeFrom":"20/10/2020 0:45 AM","datetimeTo":"26/10/2020 13:45 PM"} @portal @functional @TEST-184
User can filter the log by file type {"filter":"docx","filteredFile":"Docx"} @portal @functional @TEST-180

User can filter the log by file risks {"filter":"Allowed By Policy","filteredFile":"Allowed by Policy"} @portal @functional @TEST-163

User can filter the transactions log view using a combination of multiple filters {"riskFilter":"Safe","typeFilter":"docx","fileType":"Docx","fileRisk":"Safe"} @portal @functional @TEST-179
User can filter the log using file id {"fileId":"4fdbf181-a663-4e03-b316-eba3618a065f","datetimeFrom":"23/02/2021 15:18 PM","datetimeTo":"23/02/2021 16:18 PM"} @portal @functional @TEST-164
I can add a new user to the ui {"username":"tester1","firstname":"autotestfn","lastname":"autotestln","email":"tester1@glasswalltest.co"} @functional @TEST-171 @portal
A new user cannot be added with a invalid email {"username":"autotester","firstname":"autotesterfn","lastname":"autotesterln","email":"autotester1@"} @functional @TEST-185 @portal
A duplicate user cannot be added {"username":"dupautotester","firstname":"dupautotesterfn","lastname":"dupautotesterln","email":"dupautotester1@icaptest.co"} @functional @TEST-186 @portal
I cannot delete my own account @functional @TEST-191 @portal
